title: Hailey Bieber attends church with Justin's 'ex' Kourtney Kardashian
text:
When it comes to celebrity spotting, forget the bars and clubs of Hollywood - and head over to church.

The ever-popular Hillsong always attracts a crowd of celebrities, and Wednesday night's service was no exception, with Hailey Bieber and Kourtney Kardashian among the crowd of well connected worshippers at the Los Angeles venue.

Kourtney was linked to Hailey's now-husband Justin Bieber back in 2015, after they met at the church.

Worship: Hailey Baldwin attends church at Hillsong Los Angeles with Justin's 'ex' Kourtney Kardashian and Larsa Pippen on Wednesday

But that brief May-December romance hasn't stopped her becoming friendly with the Biebers.

Indeed Kourtney's sisters Kendall and Kylie Jenner are close pals of the pair, and even attended their wedding last month.

Joining Hailey, 22, and Kourtney, 40, at church on Wednesday was Larsa Pippen, 45, a close friend of the Kardashians.

For church, Kourtney chose a floor-length tiger-print coat, worn over black trousers and sweater.

Stylish and warm: For church, Kourtney chose a floor-length tiger-print coat, worn over black trousers and sweater

Hailey went for a leather jacket, worn over a vintage Police T-shirt.

Founded in 1983 in Australia, Hillsong is a global organisation with multiple services in major cities.

It has a large following among the young Hollywood crowd, with the Biebers regularly joined at services by Justin's ex Selena Gomez, his manager Scooter Braun, and stars such High School Musical's Vanessa Hudgens, singer Nick Jonas, actors Chris Pratt and Hailee Steinfeld.

Justin, who skipped Wednesday's service, has a close friendship with Carl Lentz, one of the lead pastors at Hillsong NYC. He leans on Lentz for guidance, and the 25-year-old even lived with the pastor and his wife for a month back in 2014.

Young Hollywood: Hailey and her pals are seen leaving church service
description: When it comes to celebrity spotting, forget the bars and clubs of Hollywood - and head over to church.
